description: Discover the best hotels in Berry, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Boutique Adults-Only Berry Suites Just Two Hours from Sydney
hotels.description: Mt Hay Retreat, located just two hours from Sydney on the NSW South Coast, offers an exclusive adults-only getaway for those seeking tranquility and relaxation. Nestled amidst the picturesque landscapes of Berry, this suite-only retreat offers the best of both worlds, allowing guests to unwind in the privacy of self-contained spaces, or by the 33m heated indoor pool and spa, sky-scraping 'Cloud Swing' or kitchen garden.

seo.title: Hotels in Berry - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Berry, Australia with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
